dct_description_sm: North oriented toward left of sheet.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins.
Decorative cartouches (with indigenous figures), compass rose, rhumb lines.
Shows political boundaries, topography, vegetation, waterways, shoals, ports.
Pictorial vignettes of figures (including scene of cannibalism), flora, fauna, ships, sea monster.
2 inset maps: Baya de todos os Sanctos; Villa d'Olinda de Pernambuco.
Appears in Hondius' Mercator-Hondius atlas: L'appendice de l'Atlas de GÃ©rard Mercator et Iudocus Hondius ..., 1633.
